page.title: 02Village life, Kelly, Devon
page.content: Kelly residents enjoy their peaceful village. Changes not wanted although one pensioner wanted a pub & needs for public transport expressed. About 50% young couples with children. School bussing to Lifton CP or Tavistock Comprehensive. Playgroup started 1984. Village hall in adjoing hamlet of Meadwell. Centre of social activities, WI, cricket club, whist drives, fund raising. Leisure interests are; sport, walking, athletics, swimming, sailing Hobbies are; knitting, music,gardening painting, beer & wine making, stained glass. Shopping is at Launceston, Tavistock, Plymouth, cash & carry. Concerns are breakdown of law & order, drugs,nuclear arms race & unemployment Solutions; stronger sentences, higher moral standards in education & work, job sharing, stronger government, abolish House of Lords, church unity.
